description.en:
"## What Is Npick Block (NPICK)?
1) Growth of SNS Platform based on NPICK BLOCK
- It makes ecosystem of extension final NPICK BLOCK with respective SNS TOKEN utilizing 
NPICK Token. 
- NPICK BLOCK ecosystem constructed by NFT technology and SNS management system 
provides an opportunity to generate economic value to more contents suppliers. 
- The opportunity to generate economic value promotes more contents producers and 
inflow of contents.
- With increased traffic, service value of NPICK BLOCK is established and the possibility for 
business expansion is raised. 
- Asset value of SNS platform based on growth of NPICK BLOCK increases. 

2) Token Economy
-NPICK BLOCK maintains fairness of each subject utilizing blockchain technology and 
utilizes NPICK Token to maintain reasonable ecosystem.
- It is possible to set a budget for separate purchase by each SNS business operator. 
- It considers elements for management of circulation amount and price-setting. 
- Setting is possible according to influence by SNS."

description.sl:
"## What Is Npick Block (NPICK)?
1) Growth of SNS Platform based on NPICK BLOCK
- It makes ecosystem of extension final NPICK BLOCK with respective SNS TOKEN utilizing 
NPICK Token. 
- NPICK BLOCK ecosystem constructed by NFT technology and SNS management system 
provides an opportunity to generate economic value to more contents suppliers. 
- The opportunity to generate economic value promotes more contents producers and 
inflow of contents.
- With increased traffic, service value of NPICK BLOCK is established and the possibility for 
business expansion is raised. 
- Asset value of SNS platform based on growth of NPICK BLOCK increases. 

2) Token Economy
-NPICK BLOCK maintains fairness of each subject utilizing blockchain technology and 
utilizes NPICK Token to maintain reasonable ecosystem.
- It is possible to set a budget for separate purchase by each SNS business operator. 
- It considers elements for management of circulation amount and price-setting. 
- Setting is possible according to influence by SNS."
